description.overview: Sebaghar is a telemedicine platform in Bangladesh, offering online doctor consultations via video, text, and audio calls. It provides a convenient way for patients to connect with doctors from various hospitals across Bangladesh, particularly for emergency situations. Sebaghar also offers services like digital prescriptions, home diagnostic services, home nursing, and medicine delivery.

description.overview: A meta description for a blog website is a short, concise summary of a blog post or page that appears in search engine results pages (SERPs) below the title and URL. It's designed to entice users to click on the link and visit the page, essentially acting as a brief advertisement.
